text: Jamides ferrari, the Ferrar's cerulean, is a small butterfly found in India that belongs to the lycaenids or blues family. It is named after Michael Lloyd Ferrar. ==See also== *List of butterflies of India *List of butterflies of India (Lycaenidae) ==References== * * * * * * Category:Jamides Category:Butterflies of India Category:Butterflies described in 1932
title: Jamides ferrari
